name: Get required signatures of protected branch

previews.name: zzzax
previews.description:
**Note:** Protected Branches API can now manage a setting for requiring signed commits. This feature is currently available for developers to preview. See the [blog post](https://developer.github.com/changes/2018-02-22-protected-branches-required-signatures) for full details. To access the API during the preview period, you must provide a custom [media type](https://developer.github.com/enterprise/2.14/v3/media) in the `Accept` header:

```
application/vnd.github.zzzax-preview+json

```

description:
When authenticated with admin or owner permissions to the repository, you can use this endpoint to check whether a branch requires signed commits. An enabled status of `true` indicates you must sign commits on this branch. For more information, see [Signing commits with GPG](https://help.github.com/articles/signing-commits-with-gpg) in GitHub Help.

**Note**: You must enable branch protection to require signed commits.
